message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.CR, cs.NE 

This paper is likely to belong to the sub-category of cs.LG (Machine Learning) as it discusses neural network generalization and proposes a robust training method. It also involves visualizing decision surfaces, which is a common technique in machine learning. 

It is also likely to belong to cs.CV (Computer Vision) as the paper discusses the geometry of decision surfaces in input space, which is a key concept in computer vision. 

cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) is another likely sub-category as the paper proposes an adversarial robustness indicator, which is a measure of a neural network's intrinsic robustness property. 

cs.CR (Cryptography and Security) is a possible sub-category as the paper discusses adversarial attacks and adversarial robustness, which are key concepts in security. 

Finally, cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) is a possible sub-category as the paper discusses neural networks and proposes a robust training method.
